name: Sandiges Game
description:
A ill mannered child is mad at you because you did not gift him ice cream for free. Now the child has locked all of the elderly people at the beach into Dixie toilets. Your job is to rescue them through solving the the child's cleverly laid out puzzles and fighting his evil crab friends!

This game was made as a -one man- school project from 2015-2016. (One or two textures are from a classmate, but the rest is self-crafted - > credits).

ps.: the ingame texts are only in german. It could be a bit hard to play, if you only speak english.
